message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm open to offers, but I value it at $100. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but my budget allows me to spend no more than $80 on this product. Would you consider accepting $85?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low just yet. How about $90? It's still a good deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can find a middle ground. Could you consider $87?
